responce.confirm: Please confirm the details of your exchange

landing.text2: Pick one of 9 supported currency from the list
landing.text4: Confirm details and send your assets to the generated address
landing.text6: Receive exchanged crypto with the best possible rate
landing.text7: It has been great working with the our team. They provide fast swaps with exceptional customer support and nearly zero technical issues. We are proud to have them as a partner in Edge.
landing.text8: Integrating our currency exchange has provided tremendous value and convenience for our users!
landing.text9: We developed a great partnership with our and their dedication to providing users a smooth, fast, secure, and easy service. Great job, guys!
landing.text10: The average time for exchange is about 5 minutes.
landing.text14: We retains your privacy and guarantees security. We are a non-custodial exchange service:
landing.text16: Lower network fees and less on-chain txs
landing.text17: Simplified listing for a young start-ups
